cui_name: EPILEPSY, FOCAL, WITH SPEECH DISORDER AND WITH OR WITHOUT MENTAL RETARDATION
reasoning: Very specific rare epilepsy phenotype combining focal seizures with speech disorder. Possibly includes Landau-Kleffner syndrome and similar conditions. Estimated ~0.8 per 100k based on subset of focal epilepsy cases (~50 per 100k) with speech impairment (~1-2%).
